definition: degree of specialization of butterfly larvae according to Paolucci (2013): monophagous (M) = one plant genus, oligophagous (O) = one plant family, polyphagous (P) = several plant families
plant families to which the host plants of the butterfly belong
names of larval host plant species of butterfly species when defined as such in Paolucci (2013) or Reinhardt et al. (2020)
